comments.body: take these last 2 out - by definition they shouldn't be there
I disagree, people will want to know by looking at the docstring what the new argument should be.  It can be removed when the arguments are no longer supported.

diffHunk:

        Do not include columns whose entries are all NaN
    rows : kwarg only alias of index [deprecated]
    cols : kwarg only alias of columns [deprecated]
